title: AI Decision Disclosure
description: A structured schema for documenting how AI is used in decision-making systems.

systemName.description: Name of the AI system or process being disclosed.

organization.description: The agency, company, or entity responsible for the system.

purpose.description: Plain language summary of what the AI system does and why it exists.

decides.description: What decisions the system makes without human input.

recommends.description: What the system suggests for human consideration.

humanDecides.description: What decisions remain under human control.

override.description: How and when humans can override or reverse system actions.

challenge.description: How people can contest or appeal a decision influenced by AI.

monitoring.description: How the systemâ€™s performance is monitored or audited over time.

accuracy.description: Any available accuracy, precision, or confidence data for the system.

lastUpdated.description: Date the disclosure was last reviewed or modified.

contact.description: Contact email or URL for follow-up questions.

version.description: Disclosure version number following semantic versioning.
